text.autoconfig.police_terminal.title: Minebuck Currency Config
text.autoconfig.police_terminal.option.p: The port used to connect to the web terminal (<address>:<port>)
text.autoconfig.police_terminal.option.h: If enabled the server will use the https protocol (strongly recommended) and the certificate path below should be set
The https certificate path, if invalid the server will default to http
The https certificate password, if invalid the server will default to http
